name: Asana
description: Asana project management integration. Create and manage tasks, search projects, update assignments, track progress, and integrate your development workflow with Asana's work management platform.
longDescription: Connects to Asana's hosted MCP endpoint via SSE. Create, update, and search tasks, manage project assignments, and track progress from Claude Code. No local server to install -- connects directly to `mcp.asana.com`. Requires an Asana access token.
